ESG REPORT 202160 61
Hudson Yards
With respect to our leased office spaces, 
our headquarters located at 55 Hudson 
Yards in New York City is a LEED Gold-
designed building that offers expansive 
views with floor to ceiling windows, 
maximizing the interior light. The building’s 
LEED Certification was a major factor in 
the decision to select 55 Hudson Yards as 
our new headquarters in 2019. Numerous 
features of our 55 Hudson Yards office 
are designed to reduce tenants’ carbon 
footprint, including water-efficient design, 
automatic lighting sensor controls, and 
renewable energy use. Additionally, the 
building in which our London office is 
located is BREEAM-certified, which is the 
dominant sustainability assessment  
method for buildings in the UK. 
Data centers
Data centers can have a tremendous 
environmental impact due to the volumes 
of electricity required to operate. Two of 
our three US data centers have a LEED 
Certification rating level of Silver, meeting 
rigorous environmental and energy 
management systems standards. Our  
data center provider procures 100% of  
the electricity consumed at these data 
centers from renewable sources.
